docs.text:
Willer Framework


Willer is a PHP framework.


Requisites 
 Dependencies




PHP 
= 7.1


Swoole




Features


ORM




It's simple and power, try it:




$transaction = new Transaction();

$model_employee = new ModelEmployee($transaction);
$model_employeerole = new ModelEmployeeRole($transaction);

$model_employeerole-
get([
    'employeerole.id' =
 7]);

$model_employee-
save([
    'employeerole_id' =
 $model_employeerole,
    'name' =
 'name of teste',
    'description' =
 'description of test',
    'email' =
 'email of test',
    'phone' =
 '123456',
    'dateCreate' =
 '2017-01-01 00:00:00',
    'status' =
 true]);

$employee_list = $model_employee
    -
where([
        'employee.status' =
 ['0','1'],
        'employee.name' =
 'name of test',
        'employeerole.name' =
 'role of test',
    ])
    -
like([
        'employee.description' =
 'my description ...',
    ])
    -
limit(1,10)
    -
orderBy(['employee.id' =
 'desc'])
    -
execute([
        'join' =
 'left']);

$model_employee-
get([
    'employee.id' =
 1,]);

$model_employeerole-
get([
    'employeerole.id' =
 7]);

$model_employee-
employeerole_id = $model_employeerole;
$model_employee-
name = 'name of teste';
$model_employee-
description = 'description of test';
$model_employee-
email = 'email of test';
$model_employee-
phone = '123456';
$model_employee-
status = true;
$model_employee-
save();

$model_employee-
get([
    'employee.id' =
 2,]);

$model_employee-
delete();

$model_employee-
dumpQuery();
$model_employeerole-
dumpQuery();




MVC




Simple architecture inspired in MVC applications, designed for agile and flexible development.






MVC folder structure






Swoole




Event-driven asynchronous 
 concurrent 
 coroutine networking engine with high performance for PHP.
GitHub - 
https://github.com/swoole/swoole-src




Bundle




Bundle apps into your project is simple








Configure App's into project








Load with composer






require
: {
    
php
: 
=7.1
,
    
wborba/willer-core
: 
2.*
,
    
MyApp
: 
1.*
,
    
MyOtherApp
: 
1.*
,
    
MyThirdApp
: 
1.*

}




Download 
 Install






GIT: 
git clone https://github.com/williamborba/willer.git






Composer: 
composer create-project wborba/willer






License


The MIT License (MIT). Please see License File for more information.

     php :  =7.1 ,
     wborba/willer-core :  2.* ,

     MyThirdApp :  1.* 
}

docs.text:
Willer Framework


Configuration


The all configuration files is into folder 
src/config
:




app.json
 Contains list of app's


config.json
 Constants the application


database.json
 Info of databases for connecting




Http Server


Willer contains the own http server with engine Swoole, it's use is very simple:


./server.sh start|stop|restart
docs.title: Configuration

docs.text: The all configuration files is into folder  src/config :   app.json  Contains list of app's  config.json  Constants the application  database.json  Info of databases for connecting
docs.title: Configuration

docs.text: Willer contains the own http server with engine Swoole, it's use is very simple:  ./server.sh start|stop|restart
docs.title: Http Server

docs.text:
Willer Framework


Html Block


Html block it's the interface creator designed for Willer, created to assemble dynamic components in HTML.


This library mounts interfaces using 
bootstrap
 css markup


Components


$html_block = new HtmlBlock\HtmlBlock();

$html_block_render = $html_block
    -
setHeadTitle('System title')
    -
addMeta(['charset' =
 'utf-8'])
    -
addCss('bootstrap.min.css')
    -
addJs('jquery-3.1.1.min.js');

$html_block_render-
appendBody();
$html_block_render-
appendBodyRow([]);




List all components and examples:


Alert


$response = new Response();

$response-
setFlashMessage('Message of error...','danger');

$flash_message = $response-
getFlashMessage();

$html_block_alert = new HtmlBlock\Alert(
    $html_block,[
        'id' =
 '',
        'class' =
 '',
        'style' =
 '',
        'container_class' =
 'col-md-12',
        'container_style' =
 '',
        'model' =
 $flash_message,]);




Breadcrumbs


$request = $this-
getRequest();

$html_block_breadcrumbs = new HtmlBlock\Breadcrumbs(
    $html_block,[
        'id' =
 '',
        'class' =
 '',
        'style' =
 '',
        'container_class' =
 'col-md-10',
        'container_style' =
 '',
        'model' =
 [
            [
                'title' =
 'Dashboard',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id'),
                'active' =
 false,
            ],
            [
                'title' =
 'Employee',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_2'),
                'active' =
 false,
            ],
            [
                'title' =
 'Registry',
                'href' =
 null,
                'active' =
 true,
            ],]]);




Form


$request = $this-
getRequest();

$transaction = new Transaction();

$model_employee = new ModelEmployee($transaction);

$html_block_form = new HtmlBlock\Form(
    $html_block,[
        'action' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_submit'),
        'method' =
 'post',
        'name' =
 '',
        'enctype' =
 '',
        'novalidate' =
 '',
        'target' =
 '',
        'id' =
  'form-id',
        'style' =
 '',
        'class' =
 '',
        'type' =
 'horizontal',
        'title' =
 'title of form',
        'text' =
 'text of form',
        'footer' =
 'Footer of form',
        'container_class' =
 'col-md-10',
        'container_style' =
 '',
        'button' =
 [
            [
                'title' =
 ' Save',
                'icon' =
 'glyphicon glyphicon-ok-circle',
                'class' =
 'btn btn-default btn-lg',
                'style' =
 '',
                'element' =
 'button',
                'type' =
 'submit',
                'href' =
 '',
            ],
            [
                'title' =
 ' Cancel',
                'icon' =
 'glyphicon glyphicon-ban-circle',
                'class' =
 'btn btn-default btn-lg',
                'style' =
 '',
                'element' =
 'a',
                'type' =
 '',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id'),
            ],
        ],
        'model' =
 $model_employee,]);




ListGroup


$request = $this-
getRequest();

$html_block_list_group = new HtmlBlock\ListGroup(
    $html_block,[
        'id' = 
 '',
        'class' = 
 '',
        'style' = 
 '',
        'container_class' =
 'col-md-2',
        'container_style' = 
 '',
        'model' =
 [
            [
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_1'),
                'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                'content' =
 'Text of test.',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-line-chart',
                'active' =
 false,
            [
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_2'),
                'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                'content' =
 'Text of test.',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-bank',
                'active' =
 false],
            [
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_3'),
                'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                'content' =
 'Text of test.',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-users',
                'active' =
 true,
                'model' =
 [
                    [
                        'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_3_1'),
                        'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                        'icon' =
 'fa fa-users',
                        'active' =
 false,
                    ],
                    [
                        'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_3_3'),
                        'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                        'icon' =
 'fa fa-users',
                        'active' =
 true,
                    ],
                    [
                        'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_3_3'),
                        'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                        'icon' =
 'fa fa-users',
                        'active' =
 false,
                    ],],
            ],
            [
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_4'),
                'title' =
 ' Title of test',
                'content' =
 'Text of test.',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-industry',
                'active' =
 false],]]);




Nav


$request = $this-
getRequest();

$html_block_nav = new HtmlBlock\Nav(
    $html_block,[
        'title' =
 'Title test',
        'title_small' =
 ' title small of test',
        'title_url' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_test'),
        'title_img' =
 '/src/public/img/img-of-test.png',
        'navbar_direction' =
 'navbar-right',
        'container_class' =
 '',
        'container_style' =
 '',
        'style' =
 '',
        'class' =
 'navbar navbar-inverse navbar-fixed-top',
        'id' =
 'nav_fixed_top',
        'model' =
 [
            [
                'title' =
 ' Title test',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_test_2'),
                'icon' =
 'glyphicon glyphicon-bell',
                'active' =
 false,
                'model' =
 [],
            ],
            [
                'title' =
 ' Title test',
                'href' =
 '',
                'icon' =
 'glyphicon glyphicon-user',
                'active' =
 false,
                'model' =
 [
                    [
                        'title' =
 ' title test',
                        'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_test_3'),
                        'icon' =
 'glyphicon glyphicon-cog',
                        'active' =
 false,
                    ],
                    [
                        'title' =
 ' Logout',
                        'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('url_id_test_4'),
                        'icon' =
 'glyphicon glyphicon-off',
                        'active' =
 false,
                    ],
                ],
            ],]]);




Table


$request = $this-
getRequest();

$transaction = new Transaction();

$model_employee = new ModelEmployee($transaction);

$model_employee_list = $model_employee
    -
where()
    -
orderBy()
    -
limit()
    -
execute()

$html_block_table = new HtmlBlock\Table(
    $html_block,[
        'container_style' =
 '',
        'container_class' =
 'col-md-12',
        'id' =
 '',
        'title' =
 '',
        'text' =
 '',
        'footer' =
 '',
        'model' =
 $model_employee_list,
        'column' =
 [
            'id',
            'name',
            'employeerole_id' =
 ['name',],
            'dateCreate',
            'status'],
        'pagination' =
 [
            'left_alt' =
 'Previous',
            'right_alt' =
 'Next'
        ],
        'button_search' =
 [
            'name' =
 'Title of button',
            'label' =
 '',
            'alt' =
 'Pesquisar',
            'id' =
 '',
            'class' =
 '',
            'icon' =
 'fa fa-search',
            'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('id_url_1'),],
        'button_extra' =
 [
            [
                'label' =
 'Title of test ',
                'alt' =
 'Title of test',
                'id' =
 '',
                'class' =
 '',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-plus',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('id_url_2')
            ],],
        'button' =
 [
            [
                'label' =
 '',
                'alt' =
 'Test of title',
                'id' =
 '',
                'class' =
 '',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-plus',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('id_url_3')
            ],
            [
                'label' =
 '',
                'alt' =
 'Foo',
                'id' =
 '',
                'class' =
 '',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-refresh',
                'href' =
 $request-
getRoute('id_url_4')
            ],
        ],
        'button_inline' =
 [
            [
                'label' =
 '',
                'alt' =
 'Test of add',
                'id' =
 '',
                'class' =
 '',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-wrench',
                'href' =
 function($id) use ($request) {
                    return $request-
getRoute('url_id_form_update',
                        ['employee_id' =
 $id]);
                },
            ],
            [
                'label' =
 '',
                'alt' =
 'Remove test',
                'id' =
 '',
                'class' =
 '',
                'icon' =
 'fa fa-remove',
                'href' =
 function($id) use ($request) {
                    return $request-
getRoute('url_id_form_delete',
                        ['employee_id' =
 $id]);
                },
            ],
        ],]);
